lead_paragraph: A 5 years old girl from Pakistan gets separated from her mother at an Indian railway station.Lost and hungry she finds shelter at the home of Pavan, an ardent devotee of Hanuman, a devout Hindu and hailing from a robust wrestling family.Bajran
